channel.title: [RS2][SRL] Basic Human AutoTalker
channel.description:
This is a human-typing Auto Talker :) [center][code] _ _ _____ _ _ / \Basic_| |_ __|_ _|_ _| | | _____ _ __ / _ \| | | | __/ _ \| |/ _` | | |/ / _ \ '__| / ___ \ |_| | || (_) | | (_| | | < __/ | /_/ \_\__,_|\__\___/|_|\__,_By Wonderguy6!
-Version History- 20/3/07 - Version 1.0 Released. 10/4/07 - Version 2.0 Released.
-Known Bugs- Verision 2.0 - Starts script when form shows How to avoid: On Script start quickly fill in the setup. then switch to rs.
-Planned Updates- Version 2.5 - Auto Login.
-Current Version- Has a.... GUI (Graphical User Interface) News Downloading Formatted Progress Report Sets all chats to Freinds. [/code][/center]

Version 2.0 Is OUT!!!

-News Downloading.

item.title: [RS2][SRL] Basic Human AutoTalker
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

let me point out some promlems.

{
_ _ _____ _ _
/ \Basic_| |_ _| | | | | _____ _ __
/ _ | | | | / _ | |/ _` | | |/ / _ \ '|
/ ___ \ || | || () | | (| | | < / |
// __,|__/||_,_By Wonderguy6!

INSTRUCTIONS

  1. Fire up the Script (You have Completed this)
  2. Drag The Crosshair over Runescape
  3. Start The Script.
  4. Go Drink a Drink.
  5. Have a pee.
  6. Go Eat.
  7. Come back and check your Progress Report.
    END-INSTRUCTIONS
    }
    program Wonderguy6sAutoTalker;
    {.include SRL\SRL.scar}

var
WordsTyped: Integer;
//SETUP\
const
SentenceToType = ‘What Would you like me to type?’; //What Sentence would you like to type?
Progress = 01; //How often in minutes you want your progress report to print
Scar= ‘Runescape the Massive Online adventure game by JaGex LTD!’; //What do you want the title of this to be?
//END-SETUP\
Procedure Talk;
begin

repeat
TypeSend(SentenceToType + Chr(13));
WordsTyped:= WordsTyped + 1;
Wait(100 + Random(40));
until(False)
end;
procedure ProgressReport;
begin
ClearDebug;
WriteLn(’[]—////////////////////\\\\\\\\\\—[]’);
WriteLn(’ Wonderguy6’‘s Autotakler ‘);
WriteLn(’ PR0GR3SS-R3P0RT ‘);
WriteLn(’ My Script has been Typing for:’ + ScriptTime2(2));
WriteLn(’ I Have typed this many sentences:’ + IntToStr(WordsTyped));
WriteLn(’[]—////////////////////\\\\\\\\\\—[]’);
end;
begin
SetupSRL;
SetTimeOut(Progress * 60, ‘ProgressReport’);
ActivateClient;
Talk;
DisguiseScar(Scar);
end.

this will never change the title, since the talking procedure happens forever.
SAme with the prgress report I htink.

Read full topic
